snippet: The actor Romany Malco began building an online following long before YouTube.
abstract: Romany Malco, who is starring in the big-screen comedy Think Like a Man, takes the Internet seriously as a business tool, and has long worked on developing his online presence both for promotion and idea development.
lead_paragraph: The actor Romany Malco began building an online following long before YouTube.

headline.seo: How Romany Malco Became an Early Online Star
headline.main: From an Early Adopter to a Social Media Star
headline.print_headline: From an Early Adopter To a Social Media Star
